foreignData.name: Tödlicher Schlag
foreignData.text: Bestimme eine Deiner Kreaturen im Spiel. Der Tödliche Schlag fügt Deinem Gegner Schadenspunkte in Höhe der Stärke dieser Kreatur zu. Lege diese Kreatur danach auf Deinen Friedhof.

name: Final Strike
originalText: Choose one of your creatures. Final Strike deals to your opponent damage equal to that creature's offense. Then, put the creature in your discard pile.

rulings.text: Players can only respond once this spell has been cast and all its costs have been paid. No one can try to destroy the creature you sacrificed to prevent you from casting this spell.
You must sacrifice exactly one creature to cast this spell; you cannot cast it without sacrificing a creature, and you cannot sacrifice additional creatures.

text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature.
Final Strike deals damage to target opponent or planeswalker equal to the sacrificed creature's power.
